about_the_game:
This is a VR shooting game. When a behemoth appears in your town, it is wanting to destroy your homeland as a brave guard, how can you let it no matter?

Players will play a brave guard, stand up, drive the aircraft to manipulate the handle, attack dinosaurs, and defend their homes.

Gameplay:

In the game, players can feel the world under the VR perspective, playing the role of robots driving VR flight aircraft, and need to find giant dinosaurs in the town and attack. Players need to pay attention to avoiding the attack of giant dinosaurs. Dinosaurs' attacks will cause damage to the robot. When the blood volume of the robot returns to zero, the game fails. In addition, there will be other obstacles in the city, such as high -rise buildings, bridges, etc., players need to avoid it carefully. Please be careful that the destructive power of the dinosaurs is very powerful. If the player fails to defeat it in the existing scene, it will not only destroy the current town, and it will continue to enter the bottom. A town until its life is over. Therefore, players must go all out and completely defeat the dinosaurs to prevent further invasion.
Under the perspective of VR perspective, the giant dinosaur that driving the flight machine to attack the town is a stimulating and interesting game. Players can experience the thrill of driving a VR flight to fight the giant dinosaur, and at the same time, they can also appreciate the realistic urban landscape. The game operation is easy to learn, suitable for players of all ages to play games. The game is highly playable, allowing players to experience the fun again and again.



If you also want to experience this exciting game, let's try it!

Operation method:

Turn on the right handle trigger button
Flying left handle up/down key
Turn to the left handle left/right button
Accelerate the upper key on the right handle
Specify the right handle under the right handle

name: VR Dinosaur Invasion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: Steam VR/HTC VIVE

short_description: This is a VR shooting game. When a behemoth appears in your town, it is wanting to destroy your homeland as a brave guard, how can you let it no matter?
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
